General.Name: Smooth Rock Ventures Corp
General.Description: Smooth Rock Ventures Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties. The company has an option to purchase agreement to acquire a 100% undivided interest in Palmetto Project comprising of 116 unpatented mining claims covering an area of 2117 acres located in Esmeralda County, Nevada. It also has an option to purchase agreement to acquire a Giroux Project consisting of 12 patented claims and 36 unpatented mining claims covering an area of 965 acres located in southeast of Hawthorne. The company was incorporated in 1966 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1130 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A4
